description:
God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends - and survival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ambition Toward the Endless Vearth! The Ark Maxim!
Fairy Vearth e no Yabou Hakobune Maxim!!
La Fairy Vearth pour ambition ! L`Arche Maxim !
طموحٌ صوب فيرث الخالدة! الفُلك ماكسيم!
ความทะเยอทะยานสู่แฟร์รี่วาซ! เรืออาร์คแม็กซิม!
限りない大地[フェアリーヴァース]への野望 方舟マクシム!!
